title: Vladimir Baryshev
text:
Vladimir Leonidovich Baryshev (; born 10 January 1960) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
Career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1977 for <a href="FC%20Turbina%20Naberezhnye%20Chelny">FC Turbina Naberezhnye Chelny</a>. He played 6 games in the <a href="UEFA%20Intertoto%20Cup%201996">UEFA Intertoto Cup 1996</a> for <a href="FC%20KAMAZ-Chally%20Naberezhnye%20Chelny">FC KAMAZ-Chally Naberezhnye Chelny</a>.
